requirements.title: Trend analysis - metrics over time
requirements.description: Display code health metrics over time (% files long, % files with issues, avg issues per file)
requirements.notes: Requires time-series data aggregation from scan history

requirements.title: app-issue-tracker integration
requirements.description: Auto-create tasks in app-issue-tracker for high-severity tidiness issues
requirements.notes: Configurable severity threshold for task creation

requirements.title: code-smell deep integration
requirements.description: Call code-smell scenario for pattern-based analysis beyond structural issues

requirements.title: Remediation automation
requirements.description: Auto-apply safe fixes (e.g., dead import removal) with approval workflow
requirements.notes: Risk-based approval: auto for safe, manual for moderate/dangerous

requirements.title: Custom rule engine
requirements.description: Allow humans to define custom tidiness rules (e.g., 'no files >X lines in api/handlers/')
requirements.notes: JSON/YAML rule definitions with regex or glob patterns

requirements.title: Multi-scenario fleet reports
requirements.description: Generate fleet-wide tidiness reports showing worst offenders across all scenarios
requirements.notes: Aggregate view for ecosystem health monitoring

requirements.title: CI/CD integration hooks
requirements.description: Webhook/API hooks for blocking PRs with new tidiness violations
requirements.notes: Compare baseline vs. PR branch tidiness scores

requirements.title: Smart file criticality prioritization
requirements.description: Use file criticality heuristics (main.go > test fixtures) to rank issues
requirements.notes: Weighted scoring based on file role/location
